results.title: Semi-conductors. Part I. Diodes and triodes
results.brief_description: The basic physics and theory of hole and electron flow in semi-conductor material as related to the P.N. junction. Basic transistor or triode operating characteristics show how and why it is an amplifying device.

results.title: Selection of Your Horse
results.brief_description: In this program Captain Mark Phillips enables you, the prospective purchaser to determine your requirements in a saddle horse and shows you how to look for a suitable animal. He explains in clear terms the individual attributes of a horse that are important to you to consider and pays particular attention to the following areas: (1) Conformation, (2) Soundness, (3) Temperament, (4) Performance under saddle, (5) Dangers and pitfalls and how to avoid them, (6) Veterinary report and how to evaluate it.

results.title: Seeds of revolution = Semillas de revolucion
results.creator_credit: Howard Enders, ABC Television (US) and Howard Enders Productions
results.brief_description: A documentary about the economic and social injustice in Hondouras. The present co-operation between the military government and the Standard Fruit Company is seen in the historical framework of class oppression and exploitation that may only be able to find its resolution through revolution.

results.title: Seeds in the wind
results.creator_credit: Paul Carpita and Triangle Film Productions
results.brief_description:
The boy decides to wag school because of a punishment given to him the previous day. He spends the time wandering around the docks smoking, thinking up excuses for his teacher, watching the loading and unloading of ships, standing, dwarfed in a drydock, hoping to fulfil his ambition to leave school and become apprenticed to one of the people he is watching - the welders, the painters, the carpenters.
En glish adaptation by Peter Graham.

results.title: See Britain
results.brief_description: A travelogue of famous beauty spots and places of interest in England. The camera visits London, Salisbury and the university town of Cambridge, travels through Lincolnshire, then goes to the rocky coast of Devon and Cornwall which charm the visitor with their unique beauty.

results.title: Security Is Everybodys Business
results.brief_description: Substance abuse, theft of drugs for re-sale, accidental injury, mugging, kidnapping and theft of records are some of the security and safety problems that occur in hospitals. This video, aimed particularly at health care workers, outlines precautions that may be taken to prevent these occurrences.

results.title: Security and the law
results.creator_credit: Andrew Costikyan, Jon J. Conrad and Security Films
results.brief_description: Security officers undertake tasks similar to police and often present themselves in a similar fashion. However they do not have the legal authority of police. This film presents the American perspective on: security officer operations; differences in the types of crime (as designated by law); arrest procedures; weapons and the use of force; and incident reporting.

results.title: Sealsong (D)
results.creator_credit: Stephen Best, International Fund for Animal Welfare and Mobius Productions
results.brief_description: Shows the annual migration of the harp seals to the coast of Newfoundland, where they await the birth of their white pups which are subsequnetly brutally slaughtered for their fur by seal hunters. Each year Brian Davies of the International Fund for Animal Welfare comes to the sea nureries in his fight to save the seals. In this film he makes a strong plea for their preservation. Narrated by Jack Lord and Brian Davies. Restricted: postprimary schools only. WARNING - MAY CONTAIN DISTURBING IMAGES.

results.title: Sea Festivals of Hong Kong
results.creator_credit: Ben R. Hart, J Murray and Hong Kong Film Unit
results.brief_description: The sea between Hong Kong and neighbouring islands is the setting for many festivals and ceremonies in Southeast Asia. A beautifully photographed film on the junk and sampan dwellers, their life, fishing and in particular their colorful religious festivals.
